name: Lemon Dijon Panko Crusted Salmon
author: Sara, Nutrient Matters
ingredients: 10g fresh dill, for seasoning and garnish (or sub dried dill in seasoning)
Cooked rice or quinoa to serve
method: Season salmon with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Combine dijon mustard, honey, dill, minced garlic, and lemon juice. Brush on surface (including sides!) of salmon fillets. Save extra sauce to drizzle at end.
Top with panko breadcrumbs and spray with a low cal cooking spray/avocado oil. Put salmon in the oven and cook for 15 mins (or 4 mins per thickness/until cooked through).
Serve with rice/quinoa and something like garlicy green beans would be nice. Drizzle with any left-over sauce amd garnish with fresh dill.
